phases.title: Adiri
phases.summary: Finalizing high-priority security fixes and validating the Adiri development environment ahead of broader testing.

phases.title: Adiri
phases.summary: Preparing the Adiri public testnet so partners and MNO validators can exercise the network in a live setting.

phases.title: Mainnet
phases.summary: Mainnet launch once Adiri is stable and the final audits and security competition are complete.

notes: Closed 30+ issues in the last 2 weeks
Continued production hardening across core network components
Database performance improvements implemented to support production workloads
Identified and resolved issues related to node restarts and epoch transitions
Restart and integration test suite expanded and exercised against new changes
DevNet restart planned to apply updated database schema and stability fixes
Significant reduction in open audit and competition findings
Removed recoverable wrapper from TEL Interchange contracts - eliminated enforced seven day delay for bridging TEL off Telcoin Network
Simplified bridge logic to standard ERC20 behavior
Codebase approaching readiness for next external audit phase

roadmap.title: Address remaining findings from security competition
